title: HARVESTER MACHINE HARVEST CROPS | NO COPYRIGHT VIDEO | NO COPYRIGHT VIDEO BACKGROUND | 4K | HD

tasks.task: Adjusting and operating heavy machinery for planting and maintenance
subtasks: Sitting in the cab of a precision farming vehicle
Setting up GPS coordinates and app connections
Operating joysticks to guide the machinery through fields
Monitoring real-time data on the display dashboard
Guiding the machinery to achieve precise row spacing
Checking tire pressure and adjusting settings to maintain optimal performance
Attaching various implements such as seeders or sprayers
Ensuring proper alignment of the attached equipment
Relaying information to field operators via voice or in-cab communication
Handling altitude sensors and calibrating the machine's height
Inspecting planting equipment for wear and tear after a day's work
Lubricating moving parts to prevent seizing
Tightening bolts and securing implements to prevent accidents
Checking filters for blockages and replacing them if necessary
Recording maintenance activities and any issues encountered

tasks.task: Cooperating with the seed maker for planting operations
subtasks: Communicating planting schedule and crop needs with the seed maker
Reviewing seeding rates and precision settings with the seed maker
Ensuring proper synchronization between the haying machine and the seed maker
Managing the delivery and storage of seed cakes or other seed materials
Loading hay onto the baler
Adjusting baler settings for different hay types and bale sizes
Maintaining the baler's cutter bar and knife edges
Unloading and inspecting bales for quality and consistency

tasks.task: Checking seed counts and equipment settings for accuracy
subtasks: Counting seeds in a sample to verify planting speed
Adjusting the seeder's rate control system to match desired seeding rates
Verifying planting depth and spacing using a test plot

tasks.task: Assessing the effectiveness of seed planting
subtasks: Scouting the fields for proper seed emergence and coverage
Identifying any areas with uneven or missed plantings
Adjusting planting strategies or equipment settings as needed

tasks.task: Ensuring adherence to safety protocols and machine use procedures
subtasks: Checking for proper PPE and seatbelt usage during operations
Familiarizing new operators with the machine's features and controls
Conducting pre- and post-op safety checks on all equipment
Maintaining a clean and organized workspace on the machinery
